overview: Rites of passage are powerful affairs...we are tested and tried, pushed to our limits and asked to perform the impossible. We strive to become one of the elect...one of the few...one of the elite and the entitled.  The Men of Falcon have their own set of standards by which their fellows are judged...trials and teamwork...endurance and momentum. Spend awhile strolling through the scenes in this smoldering collection of hazing, indoctrination, trial and initiation. Watch the men of Falcon go all out as they commit themselves to the pursuit of erotic excellence before prurient peers and demanding--sometimes demeaning--mentors. Find out who will make the cut to join an order of elite erotic icons in Rites of Initiation.
title: Rites of Initiation
